page.title: 14THE VIVIERS AT L'ETACQ
page.content:
Faulkner Fisheries is the firm which operates the{Viviers de l'Etacq}at the old German bunker which has been constructed on Le Petit Etacquerel.
The firm buys, exports, wholesales and retails local fish and shellfish all the year round and provides a daily delivery service to hotels and restaurants.
The fish supplied can be fresh, smoked or frozen and the firm is even willing to supply bait for anglers!
You can buy cooked shellfish at the bunker for 30p a cup and there are even soft drinks available to quench your thirst on a hot summer's day!
{Bon appetit!!}
